column4: I'm getting some funny errors trying to install 8.04: they're like this.
I'm getting some funny errors trying to install 8.04: they're like this. Buffer I/O error on device sr0, logical block ###### and SQUASHFS error: sb_bread failed reading block 0x1c9c6
sounds like the burn did not fully succeed. Burn at lower speed and also, make sure to md5sum of downloaded image before burning
